txt.en: TBD
Signs of the rider may be found near the horse's corpse in the southern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should search near the wintry landmark for any signs of whoever braved such a dangerous errand.
An Unfulfilled Errand
Núrzum surely did this, likely throwing rocks at the fleeing rider.
Search the rider
You have found the rider, and he is dead -- another life taken by Núrzum.
TBD
Collected the missive
Signs of the rider may be found near the horse's corpse in the southern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should search near the wintry landmark for any signs of whoever braved such a dangerous errand.
TBD
This man carried an urgent summons to the people of Dunfast to evacuate
Signs of the rider may be found near the horse's corpse in the southern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should search near the wintry landmark for any signs of whoever braved such a dangerous errand.
Gárwig's decree never reached Dunfast or the towns beyond.\n\nCyneberg will wish to hear of this dire turn of events.
Signs of the rider may be found near the horse's corpse in the southern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should search near the wintry landmark for any signs of whoever braved such a dangerous errand.

This horse was not lucky enough to survive his encounter with Núrzum, but his rider is not with him. What errand could have tempted a horse and rider to brave the frozen wilds in such a dangerous time?\n\nYou should search for the rider and find out what became of his errand.
Signs of the rider may be found west of the horse's corpse in the southern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should search near the smashed boulders for signs of what became of the pursued and fleeing rider.
The message borne by the rider has fallen not far from his side.\n\nYou should pick up the message and see if you can bear it yourself, and fulfil the errand for which this poor man died.

Cyneberg has ridden on to the village of Dunfast in the central Whitshaws.\n\nYou should bring the missive to Dunfast and show it to Cyneberg, and hopefully evacuate the people there if it is not too late.
The missive is in your inventory.\n\nYou should read the missive found on the dead rider.
Núrzum surely did this, likely throwing rocks at the fleeing rider.
Another rock was thrown, but no sign of the rider can be found here
Search nearby for signs of the horse's rider
Another boulder...and nearby, a man sprawled in the snow

Read the missive
You have come upon the corpse of a steed of Wildermore whose rider is not with it. You should search for the rider, for he may yet live.
Another boulder...and nearby, a man sprawled in the snow
The decree asking the people of Dunfast to evacuate never reached them...

This horse was not so lucky to survive his encounter with Núrzum, but his rider is not with him. What errand could have tempted a horse and rider to brave the frozen wilds in such a dangerous time?\n\nYou should search for the rider and find out what became of his errand.
